name: Inspiral
slogan: Micro-video platform which empowers users to share knowledge and skills instantly
description: Our micro-video platform is based on an entirely new format for knowledge transfer. Instead of producing traditional videos for hours, users can create highly engaging Inspiral content in minutes, and consume it in seconds. Learn any task or skill on the spot, exactly when you need it. CURRENTLY IN STEALTH MODE.

team.name: Franz Schrepf
team.bioHtml: Co-founder & CEO of Inspiral. Experienced Growth Hacker and Entrepreneur. Background in data science and ML. TEDx speaker, talkshow host.

jobs.title: Junior Product Marketeer
jobs.description:
Inspiral is a venture-backed company that empowers people around the world to share their knowledge and skills instantly. Become a cook, fix appliances, assemble furniture - learn any task in seconds. Instant knowledge. Practical science fiction.

We are a unique founding team featuring a unicorn founder (one of the TOP 10 most influential women entrepreneurs), a growth hacker, and a technology wizard. As a cherry on top, we are lucky to be joined by an incredible advisory board and support network featuring some of London’s top entrepreneurs.

In order to accelerate our growth, we are looking for an ambitious product marketing intern to join our small team and help shape the future of instant education.

For this role we ideally look for: 
* Enjoy meaningful work and want to shape the future of education through a tech-for-good platform 
* Enthusiasm for content creation on platforms like Snapchat, Instagram, Youtube 
* Understanding of social media marketing
* Outgoing personality and proactive attitude towards your work 
* Creativity and ability to learn fast

Bonus points for: 
* Experience using Adobe Photoshop and Indesign (or similar tools)
* Past projects using social media marketing strategies and tools
* Enthusiasm for content creation on platforms like Snapchat, Instagram, Youtube
* Experience writing newsletters, blogs, and building a community 

In your application please include: 
* Any online profiles (LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.) 
* A description of your professional experience (LinkedIn, CV, or similar) 
* No long cover letter needed (we prefer meeting you)

We are looking for candidates who will love our open culture and will actively help us shape it together as a team. We are looking for ambitious self-starters with a growth mindset who are enthusiastic about our mission and think on a truly global scale.

You will be working directly together with the co-founding team featuring one of Europe’s top female tech entrepreneurs as well as an experienced growth hacker. If you love creating the future of instant education as much as we do - apply now and let’s grab a coffee!

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Inspiral is a venture-backed company that empowers people around the world to share knowledge and skills instantly. Become a cook, fix appliances, assemble furniture - learn any task in seconds.

We are a unique founding team featuring a unicorn female founder, a growth hacker, and a technology wizard. Additionally, we are fortunate to be joined by an incredible advisory board and support network featuring some of London’s top entrepreneurs.

After validating user needs with our beta product, we are now ready to scale our product and be ready for high growth. You will play a key role in building the backbone of an exciting mass consumer platform aimed to create huge social impact globally.

For this role we ideally look for:

- Passion for tech-for-good products and building something meaningful for users
- Strong commercial experience in modern JavaScript (ES6 and beyond), Node.js, Express
- Knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and Responsive Web Design
- Strong knowledge of SEO, and experience optimizing web pages for SEO
- Awareness in security best practices for web and mobile platorms
- Strong appetite for building hugely scalable, reliable, and highly available software
- Creativity and ability to learn fast

Nice to have’s:

- Experience with DevOps and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Knowledge of cloud (AWS and/or Google Cloud) infrastructure at scale

We are looking for candidates who will love our open culture and will actively help us shape it together as a team. We are looking for ambitious self-starters with a growth mindset who are enthusiastic about our mission and think on a truly global scale.

We embrace diversity (gender, nationality, age, life experience, way of thinking), and we truly believe in diversity as a critical ingredient for building the global social movement we're aiming to build.

You will be working directly together with the co-founding team featuring one of Europe’s top female tech entrepreneurs as well as 3 nationalities. If you love creating the future of instant education as much as we do - apply now and let’s grab a coffee!

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.description:
Inspiral is a venture-backed company that empowers people around the world to share knowledge and skills instantly. Become a cook, fix appliances, assemble furniture - learn any task in seconds.

We are a unique founding team featuring a unicorn female founder, a growth hacker, and a technology wizard. Additionally, we are fortunate to be joined by an incredible advisory board and support network featuring some of London’s top entrepreneurs.

The initial version of our Android app has generated a ton of excitement, and we are now ready to transform this excitement into a truly unique app with top-notch user experience and advanced features. This is a truly unique opportunity to join our incredible team and lead the Android development of the platform.

For this role we ideally look for:

- Passion for tech-for-good products and building something meaningful for users
- Ability to transform designs into Android (Java) code
- Great experience creating extensible, reusable custom Views, and ability to apply animations and transformations
- Strong general knowledge of best practices in Android development, and in commonly used libraries
- Knowledge of testing frameworks and methodologies for handling the wide array of Android hardware devices and OS versions
- Experience with release management and Google Play publishing process
- Data-conscious, iterative approach to problem-solving and development
- Creativity and ability to learn fast

Nice to have’s:

- Good experience with camera handling, in particular the Camera2 API, and experience creating overlays for camera recording
- Experience with in-app analytics for enhancing user experience
- Experience with AWS and/or Google Cloud SDK

In your application please include:

- Links to apps you’ve released and a few sentences about your contribution
- Any online profiles (Github, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.)
- A description of your professional experience (LinkedIn, CV, or similar)
- No long cover letter needed (we prefer meeting you)

We are looking for candidates who will love our open culture and will actively help us shape it together as a team. We are looking for ambitious self-starters with a growth mindset who are enthusiastic about our mission and think on a truly global scale.

jobs.title: Software Engineer (Backend & AI)
jobs.description:
Inspiral is a venture-backed company that empowers people around the world to share knowledge and skills instantly. Become a cook, fix appliances, assemble furniture - learn any task in seconds.
